about.content:
I'm Brandon Ubben, a web developer, car nerd, music snob, mechanical keyboard enthusiast and huge fan of Linux and open-source software that currently lives and works in Los Angeles, CA.

This site is hosted on a Linode server that I am currently using and abusing that is running Ubuntu 18.04 LTS. It is built using an awesome JavaScript based static site generator called Eleventy. I use NGINX to serve all my sites.

education.degreeOrCertification: B.S. Computer Information Technology — Minor in Art (Web & Graphic Design)

contact.content:
I am best reached out to on Twitter or by email if you really want to chat about anything. Otherwise, you can find me on these networks primarily.
Feel free to follow me on any of these if you'd like, and I'm always open for conversation about Linux, mechanical keyboards, development or music.
